title: TikTok Browser Can Track Users’ Keystrokes, According to New Research
description: In the web browser used within the TikTok app, supplementary code lets the company track every character typed by users. The company said the capability was for troubleshooting.
dc:creator: Paul Mozur, Ryan Mac and Chang Che
media:description: TikTok, the Chinese-owned app, has faced scrutiny in Washington over its data practices.
